sections.text: Having started Citizen Advertisers in 1989, Achyuta Rao was also a known advertiser. He had a knack for publicising and marketing that was unrivalled and he successfully ran Citizen Advertisers for three decades, with clients like Janapriya, Nuziveed Seeds, Vibha Seeds, The Hindu, TMC, NECC, Reliance and many schools & colleges.
His innovative ways of advertising included conducting cooking competitions, traditional attire competitions and more, wherein his clients got optimal visibility.
